projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:

Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kkacana kecana //
na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataśca pratyayena kim //
na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate //
bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ /
pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tacca bhavenna pratyayeṣu yat //
gataṃ na gamyate tāvadagataṃ naiva gamyate /
ceṣṭā yatra gatistatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ /
na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatistataḥ //
yena tadgamyamānaṃ ca yaccātra gamanaṃ punaḥ //
gantā na gacchati tāvadagantā naiva gacchati /
pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate /
gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati /
ganteti cocyate yena gantā san yacca gacchati //
na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhādgamyamānaṃ na vā gatam /
gataṃ kiṃ gamyamānaṃ kimagataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate /
gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadagantā naiva tiṣṭhati /
yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate /
anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate //
yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhavedyadi /
ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca //
na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
gatyā yayocyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati /
gatyā yayocyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati /
sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati /
tasmādgatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate //
darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tattameva na paśyati /
na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān //
draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭaryasati te kutaḥ //
vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt nāstyakāryaṃ ca kāraṇam //
vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kkacit /
tasmānna vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate /
tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam /
ākāśam ākāśasamā dhātavaḥ pañca ye pare //
astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ /
bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam //
taṃ pratītya bhavedrāgo rakte rāgo bhavetsati //
rakte 'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
sati vāsati vā rāge rakte 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ //
naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tatsaha /
evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha /
asti cedanavasthaivaṃ nāsti cette na saṃskṛtāḥ //
sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi /
kiṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ //
notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā //
aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ /
athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ //
utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate 'sati //
tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //
sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate /
na svātmanā nirodho 'sti nirodho na parātmanā /
yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam /
sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ //
hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate //
dharme cāsatyadharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate //
satā ca kriyate nāsannāsatā kriyate ca sat /
kartrā sarve prasajyante doṣāstatra ta eva hi //
pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
yaḥ prāgvyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate 'tha saḥ //
amūnyapi bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ //
sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate /
draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ /
sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet //
na vidyate cedyasya sa na vidyanta imānyapi //
prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvameva ca /
anyo na prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punaḥ /
strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaśca striyaṃ yathā //
yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ //
ātmanaśca satattvaṃ ye bhāvānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak /
naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet /
prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ tajjarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim //
kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca /
vedanā vedakaścaiva santyarthā ye ca kecana //
pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam /
duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate //
svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet /
yadyamībhya ime 'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi /
svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam //
pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ //
vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat //
paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam //
na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam /
na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate /
sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā //
tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadyadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate /
asvabhāvo bhāvo nāsti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ //
yuvā na jīryate yasmādyasmājjīrṇo na jīryate //
na kiṃcidastyaśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati //
draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇyetāni dviśo dviśaḥ /
evaṃ rāgaśca raktaśca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām /
na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate /
saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca na vidyate //
svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca //
svabhāve parabhāve vā sati bhāvo hi sidhyati //
svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca /
ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane //
asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam /
saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cenna nityāḥ saṃsaranti te /
saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ //
saṃskārāḥ pūrvavatsattvo badhyate na na mucyate //
baddho na mucyate tāvadabaddho naiva mucyate /
yatra kastatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate //
maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca //
cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ //
phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca //
imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate /
prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā /
karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ /
anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet //
śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraśca na śāśvatam /
akṛtaṃ ca bhavetkarma kriyate na hi śāśvatam //
vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ /
karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ /
na cette tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāttattvataḥ katham //
karma kleśāśca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā //
sa bhoktā sa ca na karturanyo na ca sa eva saḥ //
karma cennāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syātkarmajaṃ phalam /
asatyatha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati //
nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ //
tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā karma ca tatkṛtam /
kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca /
nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so 'pi na vidyate /
nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati na paśyati //
sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na vā tathyaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyameva ca /
pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate /
na ca kaścana bhāvo 'sti kutaḥ kālo bhaviṣyati //
hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham //
hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham //
gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate //
hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cetphalam /
niruddhe cetphalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet /
na hyadṛṣṭvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā heturjanayate phalam //
na jātasya hyajātena phalasya saha hetunā /
nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā /
asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam /
satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam //
hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate /
hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate //
yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayetphalam //
asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā //
vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai /
vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai //
bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā /
vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā //
na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate //
bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā /
anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate //
na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate //
na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca //
saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate /
saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate //
na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
na svataḥ parataścaiva jāyate, jāyate kutaḥ //
prasajyate sa bhāvo hi nityo 'nityo 'tha vā bhavet //
carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ //
sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate //
evaṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu na yuktā bhavasaṃtatiḥ /
triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ //
skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /
svabhāvataśca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ //
yaścānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ //
yadi nāsti svabhāvaśca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate //
paraṃ nirodhādbhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā //
te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam //
te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ //
kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati /
kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit //
svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā /
vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate //
aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati /
avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati /
nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ //
anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ //
yena gṛṇhāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate /
avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā /
na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ //
nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate //
yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit /
kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati //
yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca /
phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ //
saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ /
dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati /
atra brūmaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ na tvaṃ vetsi prayojanam /
śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ ca tata evaṃ vihanyase //
te tattvaṃ na vijānanti gambhīraṃ buddhaśāsane //
sarpo yathā durgṛhīto vidyā vā duṣprasādhitā //
sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate /
sarvaṃ na yujyate tasya śūnyaṃ yasya na yujyate //
kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām /
utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase //
anityamuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi tatsvābhāvye na vidyate //
na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate /
athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate //
yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaśca na vidyate /
phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ /

apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate //
na ca dharmamadharmaṃ vā kaścijjātu kariṣyati /
kimaśūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi //
vinā dharmamadharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate /
dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate //
dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam /
duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca //

prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //

nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana //
nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate //

aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayamapyataḥ //
cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhārameva ca /
pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavaḥ bhavājjātiḥ pravartate /
yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam //
gṛhyate hyanupādāno yadyanyo na ca gṛhyate //
yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam //
yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet /
tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra jāyeta vāmṛtaḥ //
sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaścedevaṃ bhavati śāśvatam /
anutpannaśca devaḥ syājjāyate na hi śāśvatam //
aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavetacca na yujyate //
yadi tasmādanādistu saṃsāraḥ syānna cāsti saḥ //
antavān yadi lokaḥ syātparalokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitanna yujyate //
